trans-unit.source: Describes a type and a set of facets for that type.
Gets the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"></xref> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to describe a binary type by using the specified facet values.
For more information about the binary types, see [Binary (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ca858ce4-62d3-4516-bfb1-8a943dc66c61).
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
`true` to set the length of the binary type to fixed; otherwise, `false`.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object describing a binary type by using the specified facet values.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to describe a binary type by using the specified facet values.
For more information about the binary types, see [Binary (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ca858ce4-62d3-4516-bfb1-8a943dc66c61).
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
`true` to set the length of the binary type to fixed; otherwise, `false`.
The maximum length of the binary type.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object describing a binary type by using the specified facet values.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeOffsetTypeUsage"></xref> object of the type that the parameters describe.
The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the offset.
The degree of granularity of the <xref href="System.DateTimeOffset"></xref> in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported.
For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeOffsetTypeUsage"></xref> object.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeTypeUsage"></xref> object of the type that the parameters describe.
The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> object.
The degree of granularity of the <xref href="System.DateTimeOffset"></xref> in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported.
For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DateTimeTypeUsage"></xref> object.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to describe a decimal type with unbounded precision and scale facet values.
For more information about the decimal types, see [Decimal(EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/99239537-0336-4705-b581-a79d89430bc7).
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object describing a decimal type with unbounded precision and scale facet values.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to describe a decimal type by using the specified facet values.
For more information about the decimal types, see [Decimal(EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/99239537-0336-4705-b581-a79d89430bc7).
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
The precision of the decimal type as type <xref href="System.Byte"></xref>.
The scale of the decimal type as type <xref href="System.Byte"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object describing a decimal type by using the specified facet values.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object with the specified conceptual model type.

If the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> is a primitive type, such as `String`, `Decimal`, `Binary` or `DateTime`, this method invokes one of the corresponding methods declared in the <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage> class.
Otherwise, it creates a <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage> object with the specified <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType> directly.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object with the default facet values for the specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to describe a string type by using the specified facet values and unbounded `MaxLength`.
For more information about the string types, see [String (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/66035587-41f3-4c36-8be0-71b035700c82).
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
`true` to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, `false`.
`true` to set the length of the string type to fixed; otherwise, `false`
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object describing a string type by using the specified facet values and unbounded `MaxLength`.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to describe a string type by using the specified facet values.
For more information about the string types, see [String (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/66035587-41f3-4c36-8be0-71b035700c82).
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType"></xref> for which the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object is created.
`true` to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, `false`.
`true` to set the character-encoding standard of the string type to Unicode; otherwise, `false`.
`true` to set the length of the string type to fixed; otherwise, `false`.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object describing a string type by using the specified facet values.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TimeTypeUsage"></xref> object of the type that the parameters describe.
The simple type that defines the units of measurement of the <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> object.
The degree of granularity of the <xref href="System.DateTimeOffset"></xref> in fractions of a second, based on the number of decimal places supported.
For example a precision of 3 means the granularity supported is milliseconds.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TimeTypeUsage"></xref> object.
Gets the type information described by this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object that represents the type information described by this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
Gets the list of facets for the type that is described by this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.

A collection of type <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection`1"></xref> that contains the list of facets for the type that is described by this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
Checks whether this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> is a subtype of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> object to be checked.
`true` if this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> is a subtype of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the full name of the type described by this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref>.
The full name of the type described by this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage"></xref> as string.
